name: ArphaPlus
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can use Arpha Plus skill to control Arpha smart home devices. 
1. Search arpha plus from Google Play Store or App Store
(https://apps.apple.com/tw/app/arpha-plus/id1621837300 or https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.blackview.arphaplus)
2. create a account
3. login
